name: Scarf's Adventure
description:
A RTS engine I came up with

you can probably guess the controls.

Note: None of the UI has any real functionality at the moment apart from displaying a selected unit's stats, also some of the screenshots I display are likely to be functions that haven't been fully inplemented. 

Extra Keys:

  • Take Damage = F1
  • Deplete Magic = F2
  • EXP Up = F3
  • Pause Button = Escape
